content: I panicked when I read that they expected big protests in Riyadh today, but then my wife reassured me, saying that she had just bought two bottles of olive oil, ensuring our living standard for months, even if oil prices were to explode.
translations: ita:Sono stato preso dal panico quando ho letto che si aspettano grandi proteste a Riyadh oggi, ma poi mia moglie mi ha rass
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by MUIRIEL (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
